verbs.description: [V: sacked] [ARG1: sri lanka] pm stays put as crisis deepens a constitutional crisis gripping sri lanka since the president shock dismissal of prime minister ranil wickremesinghe erupted into violence sunday with a man shot dead and two others injured in colombo official kandy mahinda rajapakse india united states ranil wickremesinghe colombo g l peiris mahinda rajapaksa maithripala sirisena indian ocean temple trees raveesh kumar victor ivan prime minister karu jayasuriya china president maithripala sirisena president prime ministers house colombo european union ranil wickremasinghe sirisena maldives sri premiership sri lanka united people freedom alliance
